question: [File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Localhost vs External Address] If some addresses are localhost and others are external IPs, can this create asymmetric connectivity where some shards can't reach others? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Concurrent Initialization] If multiple threads call ProcessExecutorService::new() concurrently for different shards, can races in global state (metrics, OnceCell) cause initialization failures? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Start Before Complete Init] Between creating ExecutorService and calling start(), can another thread interact with the partially initialized state causing race conditions? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: shutdown()] [Shutdown During Execution] If shutdown() is called while ExecutorService is actively processing a block, are there proper synchronization mechanisms to prevent data races? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: shutdown()] [Multiple Shutdown Calls] Can concurrent shutdown() calls from different threads cause race conditions in NetworkController.shutdown() leading to double-free or corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [No Error Propagation] The function doesn't return Result, so all errors must panic - can this cause unexpected process crashes instead of graceful degradation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Panic on Invalid Input] If invalid parameters are provided, does the code panic immediately or continue with undefined behavior? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: shutdown()] [Shutdown Error Handling] Does shutdown() handle errors gracefully, or can errors during shutdown cause the process to panic or hang? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Struct: ProcessExecutorService] [Memory Leak] If ProcessExecutorService is never dropped (e.g., leaked with Box::leak), are network sockets and threads properly cleaned up, or do they leak permanently? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Struct: ProcessExecutorService] [Circular References] Can Arc cycles between ExecutorService and its components prevent proper cleanup even when ProcessExecutorService is dropped? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Thread Stack Overflow] If the executor thread spawned by ExecutorService has insufficient stack size for deep transaction execution, can stack overflow crash the shard? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Dependency Graph Cycles] If cross-shard transaction dependencies form a cycle (A depends on B, B depends on A), does the system detect and reject this, or can it cause deadlock? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Missing Dependency Handling] If a transaction has a cross-shard dependency but the required shard is offline, does execution properly fail or does it proceed with stale data? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Dependency Version Skew] If shards execute dependencies at different block heights, can this cause inconsistent state reads across shards? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Dependency Spoofing] Can a malicious shard send fake dependency satisfaction signals to other shards, causing them to execute transactions with unsatisfied dependencies? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Block Boundary Sync] When a block is split across shards, are shards guaranteed to start and commit together, or can timing differences cause partial block commits? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Execution Result Aggregation] When the coordinator collects results from shards, does it properly verify that all shards completed successfully before committing? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Shard Result Timeout] If one shard takes too long to execute, does the coordinator wait indefinitely, timeout and abort, or proceed without it? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Result Ordering Guarantee] When reassembling shard outputs, is the transaction order preserved exactly as in the original block, or can reordering cause state mismatches? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Message Type Validation] Does NetworkController validate message types to prevent type confusion attacks where execution commands are misinterpreted as state queries? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Channel Overflow] If the crossbeam channels between coordinator and shards fill up, can this cause deadlock or message loss? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Sender Authentication] Are message senders authenticated, or can any network peer send execution commands to shards by spoofing the coordinator? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [Message Ordering] Does the network layer guarantee message ordering, or can out-of-order execution commands cause state corruption? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [State View Staleness] When RemoteStateViewClient fetches state from other shards, is there a mechanism to ensure state freshness, or can stale reads cause execution errors? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor-service/src/process_executor_service.rs] [Function: new()] [State Cache Poisoning] Can a malicious shard return incorrect state values that get cached, causing subsequent transactions to execute against corrupted state? (Critical)
